root.name: Voyage
root.description: Based on Jules Verne's novels From the Earth to the Moon and Around the Moon, Voyage is a classic point-and-click adventure. Michel Ardan survives the journey from the earth and awakens in an early 20th century space capsule resting on quietly on the surface of the moon. Yet, things take a turn for the worse as Michel discovers his two fellow travelers weren't as lucky. Alone in a strange landscape with unknown dangers, Michel must uncover the source of his companions fate and brave a new world with ruins of an ancient alien race.

similar_games.game: ECHO: Secrets of the Lost Cavern
